name: 笔记与任务日历
author: flyMD
description: 提供日记、会议记录、读书笔记等常用模板，并集成任务总览与简单日历视图，基于 YAML 前置信息与 TODO 语法构建规范化笔记与时间视图。

en.name: Journals & Tasks
en.description: Provide common templates such as daily notes, meeting notes, and reading notes, and integrate task overview with a simple calendar view, all based on YAML front matter and TODO syntax.
